title: Kim Song-hui (footballer)
text:
Kim Song-hui (; ; born 23 February 1987) is a <a href="Korean%20people">North Korean</a> female <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er, who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> for <a href="Pyongyang%20Sports%20Club">Pyongyang Sports Club</a> in the Women's <a href="DPR%20Korea%20League">DPR Korea League</a>.
Kim was selected for the <a href="North%20Korea%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">North Korea women's national team</a>, participating in the <a href="2012%20Summer%20Olympics">2012 Summer Olympics</a> and scored their two opening goals of the tournament on 25 July 2012, in a 2–0 win at <a href="Hampden%20Park">Hampden Park</a>, <a href="Glasgow">Glasgow</a> against <a href="Colombia%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Colombia</a>.
